decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (0034-RE-001; 0034-RE-005; 0034-RE-006; 0034-RE-007; 0034-RE-008; 0034-RE-009; 0034-RE-010; 0034-RE-011; Design and Access Statement;  received on 08/06/2016; 0034-RE-012 Rev A; 0034-RE-013 Rev A; 0034-RE-014 Rev A; Received 09/09/2016.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800 to 1800 on Mondays to Friday and 0800 to 1300 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
description: Creation of a new basement room with front lightwell, erection of a single storey side extension.
